name: IndianHolidayPlanner
0:
”Alexa, open Indian Holiday Planner”
”Alexa, ask Indian Holiday Planner where can I go in November”
”Alexa, ask Indian Holiday Planner, what is the best destination for month of July”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: indian holiday planner
des:
India has endless list for travel destination - from Himalayan peaks to Indian Ocean coastline, there are thousands of choices per season of varied types. 
Once the travel month is decided, the user can utilize this skill and provide just the month name.
This skill can give the user one of the best Indian holiday destinations for the specific month of the year. Along with the destination name, it also gives 'how to reach' information.
If user's device supports visuals, the skill would give a beautiful photo of the location and more detailed description.
